item.description: Did you ever wonder what Camp Squanto was all about?  Do you want to spend some time traveling back to childhood?  Spend it with us as we tour this privately owned Boy scout Camp that is located on the outer edge of The Myles Standish State Forest. The staff has graciously allowed us to visit their facility and open the doors to a past time.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us at the forest headquarters to carpool over to Camp Squanto. We are leaving the headquarter's parking lot promptly at 12:45 to make it to Camp Squanto for 1:00.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Take a tour of Camp Squanto
